roleset.name: replace with more delicate language
roleset.note: EUPHEMIZE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR. 'Euphemism' is generally non-eventive, referring to the actual token used, and should be represented in AMR as a thing :arg2-of this roleset.

role.descr: unspoken thing, for which a euphamism stands in

example.name: euphemize-v
example.text: The fact that it-1 was then euphemized [*-1] as "some horseplay in the showers" by administration officials is something that really outrages me.
